name: Multiple Identities - Scammer Switches Personas
description: Scammer switches identities mid-conversation, first posing as SBI, then claiming to be RBI, then back to SBI. Tests the system's handling of identity-switching tactics.

turns.scammer_message: SBI Customer Care: Your account needs immediate verification. Reference: SBI-SEC-2026. Your savings account has been flagged for suspicious activity by our fraud detection system.
turns.notes: Scammer poses as SBI customer care. Official-sounding reference number. No intel yet.

turns.scammer_message: This is SBI Fraud Prevention Unit. We have blocked 2 unauthorized NEFT transfers from your account totaling Rs 1,85,000. To unblock your account and reverse these transactions, verification is mandatory within 2 hours.
turns.notes: Still posing as SBI. Building urgency with fake transaction details. No intel revealed.

turns.scammer_message: Actually this is RBI, we're taking over the investigation. This matter has been escalated to the Reserve Bank of India Cyber Crime Division as it involves a multi-state fraud ring. Your cooperation is now required by law under Section 66D of the IT Act.
turns.notes: Identity switch #1: SBI to RBI. Uses legal threats to increase pressure. No intel yet.

turns.scammer_message: This is RBI Officer Vikram Singh, Badge ID RBI-CYB-4481. For the investigation record, please contact me directly at +91-8855443322. You can also submit your verification documents to verify@sbi-care.help. Failure to comply may result in account seizure.
turns.notes: Phone and email revealed while posing as RBI officer. Note: email domain still says sbi-care, inconsistent with RBI identity.

turns.scammer_message: As part of the RBI investigation protocol, we need to verify your account ownership. Please send a nominal amount of Rs 1 to the secure investigation UPI: sbi.multiid@ybl. Your account 1133557799002244 will be unfrozen once verified.
turns.notes: UPI and bank account revealed. Still claiming RBI but UPI ID has 'sbi' in it - another consistency error.

turns.scammer_message: This is SBI Customer Care again. The RBI investigation has been completed and your account 1133557799002244 has been cleared. For your records, please save this reference. Contact +91-8855443322 or verify@sbi-care.help for any future queries. Thank you for your cooperation.
turns.notes: Identity switch #2: back to SBI. Final message repeats bank account, phone, and email. All intel extracted.
